text: seongseoui baegseongdeul-eul indoham-e gajang joh-eun bangbeob-eulo indohadoe non jaenghaji malla geuleona geudeul jung-e sa agham-eulo daejeoghaneun jaga issdamyeon illeogalodoe ulineun uliege gyesi doen geosgwa neohuiege gyesidoen geos-eul midnola uliui hananimgwa neohuiui hananim-eun gat-eun hananim-isini uli neun geubunkke sunjongham-ila
